function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population densities of Ae. aegypti in Rio de Janeiro","Impact":"Increased risk of yellow fever epidemic","Mitigation":"Implement control measures like oiling water containers and house searches for larvae and adults","Technologies":"Larviciding with Paris Green and house spraying with short-acting pyrethroids","People":"Population of Rio de Janeiro","Owner":"Brazilian Government, Rockefeller Foundation"},{"Description":"Colonial expansion in SSA and massive outbreaks of HAT","Impact":"Increased spread of HAT due to conditions of colonial expansion","Mitigation":"Study the disease and implement controlled methods of tsetse control","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"Population of areas affected by colonial expansion","Owner":"Scientific missions and relevant authorities"},{"Description":"Game destruction in Southern Rhodesia for tsetse control","Impact":"Negative impact on wildlife and ecosystem due to game destruction","Mitigation":"Implement more sustainable tsetse control methods","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"Wildlife and ecosystem in Southern Rhodesia","Owner":"Authorities responsible for tsetse control"}]}
